title: Rename systems/container.scm to systems/agent.scm
description: Single package/service definition for all agents. Export agent-home-environment and agent-home-profile.
close_reason: Renamed systems/container.scm to systems/agent.scm. Updated module name, added home-agent-service-type, exported agent-home-environment and agent-home-packages. Tested with guix home dry-run and REPL.

title: Update internal imports in moved modules
description: Each moved module that imports another moved module needs path updates. Change imports from (asahi guix ...) to (asahi guix maintenance ...) for all cross-references.

title: Check manual/ and installer-images/ directories
description: Check if channel's manual/ and installer-images/ directories contain copies of moved modules. If so, delete them or document as orphaned.

title: The Daltons - Correct Architecture Implementation
description: Implement proper container architecture: container runs guix home container (shepherd inside), Emacs runs as daemon via shepherd service, socket shared via XDG_RUNTIME_DIR, emacsclient from host connects to daemon. Files: 1 to create, 3 to modify.
close_reason: All subtasks completed: daemon support added to home-emacs-service-type, agent.scm updated to use daemon mode, agent-container script created, shepherd services updated to use agent-container, container-run kept for backwards compatibility. Dry-run verification passed.

title: Update home-agent-service-type shepherd services
description: Change from running container-emacs to running agent-container. Include herd actions for emacsclient/eval.
close_reason: Updated home-agent-shepherd-services to use agent-container instead of container-emacs. Added agent-container to deployed files. Added AGENT_NAME environment variable for each agent.

title: Verify modules load correctly pre-merge
description: Test that channel modules load without (json) dependency and maintenance modules load correctly. Run guix repl tests and make check in maintenance repo.

title: Update StumpWM config
description: Keep named groups (Emacs=1, Web=2, Slack=7, Logs=8, Top=9). Add numbered groups 3-6 for agents (jack, joe, william, averell). Bind emacsclient-agent and claude-agent to keys.
close_reason: Updated StumpWM config with agent keymap. Added key bindings: s-t A for agent submenu (c=claude-agent, e=emacsclient-agent, s=agent-status, j/J/w/a for direct agent access by name). Groups 3-6 already mapped to Dalton agents via frame preferences.

title: Create agent scripts
description: Create agent-for-group (centralized group→agent mapping), agent-ensure (start agent on-demand if not running), agent-exec (run command in agent container), agent-status (show all agent statuses), agent-restart (restart an agent), emacsclient-agent (connect to agent's Emacs), claude-agent (run Claude in agent container).
close_reason: Created 6 agent scripts: agent-for-group (group→agent mapping), agent-ensure (start on-demand), agent-exec (run command in container), agent-status (show statuses), emacsclient-agent (connect to agent's Emacs), claude-agent (run Claude in container). Updated home-agent-service-type to deploy scripts via home-files-service-type extension. Tested with guix home dry-run.

title: Document rollback plan
description: Document rollback: 1) git revert channel PR if issues arise, 2) keep maintenance additions (non-breaking), 3) point channels.scm to pre-change commit temporarily. Keep in epic notes or PR description.

title: Update systems/agent.scm
description: Configure the emacs service with daemon mode enabled (daemon? #t). AGENT_NAME is read at runtime by the shepherd service inside the container.
close_reason: Configured home-emacs-service-type with daemon mode enabled (daemon? #t) in agent.scm. The default daemon-name 'server' is used.

title: Add agent-container to deployed files
description: Add agent-container script to home-agent-files in modules/r0man/guix/home/agent.scm.
close_reason: agent-container was already added to home-agent-files in agent.scm when completing guix-home-1gp

title: The Daltons - Multi-Agent Home Configuration
description: Four agent containers named after the Dalton brothers (Jack, Joe, William, Averell), each running an Emacs daemon. Workspaces in StumpWM map to agents, and emacsclient-agent auto-connects to the right one based on current workspace. All agents share a single profile for fast builds. Files: 8 to create, 3 to modify, 4 to delete.
close_reason:
Epic complete. Created multi-agent home configuration for the Daltons (Jack, Joe, William, Averell). Includes:
- home/agent.scm: Service type with socket dir creation and script deployment
- systems/agent.scm: Renamed from container.scm, shared environment for all agents
- 6 agent scripts: agent-for-group, agent-ensure, agent-exec, agent-status, emacsclient-agent, claude-agent
- StumpWM config: Agent keymap (s-t A) with key bindings
- precision.scm: Integrated home-agent-service-type
All files tested with guix home dry-run.

title: Add daemon support to home-emacs-service-type
description: Extend the existing configuration record with daemon fields (daemon?, daemon-name) and add shepherd service extension for Emacs daemon mode in modules/r0man/guix/home/emacs.scm.
close_reason: Implemented daemon support in home-emacs-service-type: added daemon? and daemon-name fields to configuration record, added shepherd service extension that creates emacs-<name> shepherd service when enabled

title: Fix: guix system reconfigure failure - no code for module (git)
description: Move modules with (json) and (guix channels) dependencies from asahi-guix/channel to asahi-guix/maintenance to fix guix-daemon compilation in isolated chroot. Files: 17 to move/delete from channel, 17 to add to maintenance, 1 to modify.

comments.author: Roman Scherer
comments.text:
## Import Path Changes
| Old | New |
|-----|-----|
| (asahi guix channels) | (asahi guix maintenance channels) |
| (asahi guix ci) | (asahi guix maintenance ci) |
| (asahi guix build sfdisk) | (asahi guix maintenance build sfdisk) |
| (asahi guix build-system installer) | (asahi guix maintenance build-system installer) |
| (asahi guix packages installer) | (asahi guix maintenance packages installer) |
| (asahi guix installer ...) | (asahi guix maintenance installer ...) |
| (asahi guix systems ...) | (asahi guix maintenance systems ...) |
| (asahi guix home config) | (asahi guix maintenance home config) |

title: Update precision.scm
description: Add home-agent-profile-service-type (once). Add four home-agent-service-type instances for jack, joe, william, averell.
close_reason: Added home-agent-service-type to precision.scm. Updated container-home.scm to use renamed agent module and added home-agent-home-service-type alias. Both precision.scm and agent.scm dry-run successfully.

title: Check CI impact
description: Check if asahi-guix has Cuirass/CI jobs building installer packages. These may need updating to pull from maintenance channel. Coordinate with maintainers on CI configuration changes.

title: Create agent-container script
description: New script that uses guix home container instead of guix shell --container. Runs a full home environment with shepherd inside.
close_reason: Created agent-container script that uses 'guix home container' instead of 'guix shell --container'. The script runs the full home environment with shepherd inside.

title: Create home/agent.scm service module
description: Define home-agent-configuration record (name, profile). Define home-agent-service-type with shepherd extension. Define home-agent-profile-service-type for shared profile symlink. Handle socket directory creation, container startup.
notes:
Created modules/r0man/guix/home/agent.scm with:
- home-agent-configuration record (name, socket-dir, profile fields)
- home-agent-service-type with home-activation-service-type extension
- home-agent-activation creates socket directory at XDG_RUNTIME_DIR/emacs-NAME
- %dalton-agents list of Dalton brother agent names
- Tested with guix home dry-run - module loads and service type works
close_reason: Created modules/r0man/guix/home/agent.scm with home-agent-configuration record, home-agent-service-type, and activation extension for socket directory creation. Module tested successfully with guix home dry-run.

title: Prepare maintenance repository directories
description: Create missing directories in asahi-guix/maintenance: maintenance/home, maintenance/installer, maintenance/build-system, and tests/maintenance/build.

title: Copy modules to maintenance with updated namespaces
description: Copy files from channel to maintenance repo, updating each module declaration from (asahi guix ...) to (asahi guix maintenance ...). Includes channels, ci, build/sfdisk, build-system/installer, packages/installer, installer/*, systems/*, and home/config.

title: Post-merge verification
description: After PRs merged: 1) guix pull completes without errors, 2) sudo guix system reconfigure --dry-run works, 3) guix home reconfigure --dry-run works, 4) asahi-installer-script builds from maintenance channel.

title: Merge PRs in correct order
description: Merge maintenance PR first (fix/move-extras-from-channel), wait for CI, then merge channel PR (fix/move-extras-to-maintenance). This order prevents breakage window.

title: Delete modules from channel repository
description: After maintenance PR is merged, delete moved modules from channel: channels.scm, ci.scm, build/sfdisk.scm, build-system/installer.scm, packages/installer.scm, installer/, systems/, home/config.scm, and test file.

title: Keep container-run for backwards compatibility
description: Keep container-run as-is for ad-hoc FHS container usage. The new architecture doesn't depend on it.
close_reason: container-run is already deployed via home-emacs-files in emacs.scm. No changes needed - it remains available for ad-hoc FHS container usage alongside the new agent-container script.

title: Create feature branches in both repositories
description: Create fix/move-extras-to-maintenance branch in asahi-guix/channel and fix/move-extras-from-channel branch in asahi-guix/maintenance.

title: Extract %asahi-installer-source to break dependency chain
description: In asahi-guix/channel, edit packages/firmware.scm to add %asahi-installer-source origin definition directly and remove the installer import. This breaks the dependency chain.
